typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		pairing_id as string,
		user_id as string,
		position as string,
		name as string,
		date as string,
		start_date as string,
		end_date as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFPairing
SFPairing derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		date as date,
		end_date as date,
		name as string,
		pairing_id as string,
		position as string,
		start_date as date,
		updated_at as string,
		user_id as string,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		date,
		end_date,
		name,
		pairing_id,
		position,
		start_date,
		updated_at,
		user_id,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	)) ~> PARINGtoSQL
